songs.title: Letter To Michelle Obama
songs.lyrics:
Michelle,

Is the ULTIMATE example of a truly strong
African American woman.

She is a caring mother, she's a loving wife,
while at the same time, she is the FIRST LADY!!!!

No matter the pressure, and stress of being
under the microscope - she is humble, loving and
sincere.

She builds and nurtures her family, while also
looking out for so many millions in so many ways

Michelle, thank you so much for every single
thing that u do for us - I am PROUD to have
my daughter grow up in a world where she has
people like you, to look upto.

Love
Beyoncé
